highlights: Identified web-based user interactions and developed highly responsive user interface components via React concepts
Executed full-stack website launch with responsive mobile layout and cross-browser compatibility.
Accelerated client's Google ranking to page 1 for multiple keywords
Coordinated with UX designers to create beautiful, functional and fast interfaces.
Created modular, responsive templates using modern CSS techniques and JavaScript libraries.
Planned and managed the front-end development of the website.
Collaborated with designers to ensure designs were efficient and technically sound.
Worked directly with client to develop technical solutions for business cases.
Conducted A/B testing to identify bugs and UI improvements.
Utilized HTML, CSS and bootstrap within React framework to create a responsive user interface.
